channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 游댮 05:09 Air alarm to the Poltava region follow the following messages.
item.description: 游댮 05:09 Air alarm to the Poltava region follow the following messages.#Poltava_ex This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 游댮 05:06 Air alarm to Kharkiv Oblast Watch Further Messages.
item.description: 游댮 05:06 Air alarm to Kharkiv Oblast Watch Further Messages.#Kharkiv_. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.description: 游댮 05:05 Air anxiety in Kharkiv and Kharkiv Territorial Citizen for Further Messages. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 游댮 05:01 The threat of shelling! Now in Marganets and Manganese territorial community artillery shelling. Walk to shelter!
item.description: 游댮 05:01 The threat of shelling! Now in Marganets and Manganese territorial community artillery shelling. Walk to shelter! This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
